name: Zoho Meeting
tag_list: online-meetings, web-conferencing, web-meetings, audio-conferencing, conferencing, remote-support
description: Simple and Secure Online Meeting Tool
overview:
Zoho Meeting is an online meeting serice from Zohoâ€™s range of business solutions. With Zoho Meeting users can create online, web meetings in which their desired participants can join from any where. The joining process is much simpler which requires no installation or plugin dependency. This web conferencing software also provides industry standard audio conferencing with VOIP, detailed reports, corporate multi-user management and re-branding.

Zoho Meeting is available in 19 languages. It’s secure and firewall friendly. The monthly subscription starts at $12/month though it offers a free version too.
